H

HadoopCuratorClient - Class in edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface
Similar in functionality to the CuratorClient.java (packaged with the Curator, in the `curator-clients` directory), this class simply provides a way to "talk" to a locally running Curator.
HadoopCuratorClient(FileSystem) - Constructor for class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.HadoopCuratorClient
Constructs a Curator Client.
HadoopInterface - Class in edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface
A program that allows Hadoop to interface with Curator clients running on the Hadoop nodes.
HadoopInterface() - Constructor for class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.HadoopInterface
 
HadoopRecord - Class in edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure
A version of the Curator's document record, for use on the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), which does not rely on database calls.
HadoopRecord() - Constructor for class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.HadoopRecord
Zero-argument constructor for use by the Hadoop backend.
HadoopRecord(String, FileSystem, Configuration) - Constructor for class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.HadoopRecord
Constructs a record object and fills it with all annotations for this document which already exist on the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS).
hasAnnotation(Record, AnnotationMode) - Static method in class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.RecordTools
Checks a record for a given annotation type
hasAnnotations(Record) - Static method in class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.RecordTools
Checks to see if a Record object contains annotations
HDFSFileExists(Path) - Method in class edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.FileSystemHandler
Returns TRUE if the file exists at the specified path, and false otherwise.
